attributes.action: work with farmers to reduce mud on national speed limit roads
attributes.additional_details: i think the local councils should work with farmers to help reduce the amount of mud left on higher speed roads. when mixed with rain the roads can becone very slippy and often dangerous

rejection.details: As your petition points out, this is a matter for local authorities.  You may wish to rephrase the petition to state what action are you asking central government to take.
